attributes.action: leave FIFA and set up honest International Football Association
attributes.additional_details: FIFA has proved that as an organisation it is completely indifferent to views of ordinary football fans, national associations or anything or anybody that criticises it.  It is beyond reform, therefore the Football Associations of the Home Nations should leave FIFA and establish an open, transparent and democratic International Football Association. The Home Associations should also  persuade as many other national associations as possible to join the new organisation.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Football Association.
